title: Workflow Management Plan Schema
description: Schema for a plan with multiple activities, such as a weather notification system.

plan_name.description: The name of the overall plan.

activities.description: An array of individual activities within the plan.

activity_type.description: The type of activity. Currently, 'delegation_agent', 'direct_task_execution', and 'direct_tool_use' are expected.

id.description: A unique identifier for the activity.

description.description: A human-readable description of what the activity does.

type.description: A specific, operational type for the activity (e.g., 'weather_information_retrieval').

agent.description: Configuration for the agent assigned to the activity.

skill_to_use.description: The specific skill required for the agent, or null if none.

assigned_agent_id_preference.description: The preferred agent to execute this activity.

agent_context.description: Additional context or instructions for the agent.

tools.description: An array of tools to be used.

tool_to_use.description: The tool to be used, or null if no specific tool is required.

tool_parameters.description: An object containing parameters for the tool. The properties within this object are dynamic.

tasks_parameters.description: An object containing parameters for the task itself.

dependencies.description: An array of objects, each specifying a dependency on another activity.

source.description: The ID of the source activity this activity depends on.

expected_outcome.description: A description of the expected result of the activity.
